title: Rob Lowe talks "spectacular" sex in You, Me and the Apocalypse first look - TV
text: Rob Lowe's Father Jude Sutton embraces his natural urges in this first-look at the next You, Me and the Apocalypse. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4554203562001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14554203562001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4554203562001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4554203562001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14554203562001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4554203562001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Father Jude outlines his surprising views on sex, money and "the real world" in Digital Spy's exclusive preview from episode 3.You, Me and the Apocalypse is a comical take on the end of the world, bringing together the best of UK and US comic talent. Â© Sky / Andrea Southam From Britain, there's The Wrong Mans star Mathew Baynton and Peep Show's Paterson Joseph, while Parks and Rec legend Lowe and The Office actress Jenna Fischer are among the American stars.The series - a co-production with US network NBC - launched with an overnight audience of 432k earlier this month.The next episode airs on Wednesday (October 14) at 9pm on Sky1.You, Me and the Apocalypse: Is Sky1's ambitious sitcom a dystopian delight?You, Me and the Apocalypse is like a Tom Cruise movie, says The Office star Jenna Fischer
